info.titleen: This Friday is an important day.
info.descko: 졸업앨범 촬영을 위해 모든 학생들이 신어야 하는 신발 색깔은?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: I have an announcement from the graduation yearbook committee.
sentense.en_: I have an announcement from the graduation yearbook committee.

sentense.en: This Friday is an important day.
sentense.en_: This Friday is an important day.

sentense.en: The photographer will be here to take pictures of all the seniors.
sentense.en_: The photographer will be here to take pictures of all the seniors.
sentense.ko: 사진사가 모든 졸업생들의 사진을 찍기 위해 올 것입니다.

sentense.en: Remember that the pictures will be taken individually and in groups.
sentense.en_: Remember that the pictures will be taken individually and in groups.
sentense.ko: 개인 사진과 단체사진을 찍게 된다는 것을 잊지 마세요.

sentense.en: Girls should wear a light-colored blouse and a dark skirt.
sentense.en_: Girls should wear a light-colored blouse and a dark skirt.
sentense.ko: 여학생은 밝은 색의 블라우스와 어두운 스커트를 입어야 해요.

sentense.en: Boys should wear black pants, a white shirt, and a tie.
sentense.en_: Boys should wear black pants, a white shirt, and a tie.
sentense.ko: 남학생은 검은 바지와 하얀 셔츠 그리고 타이를 입어야 해요.

sentense.en: Every student needs black or brown shoes.
sentense.en_: Every student needs black or brown shoes.
sentense.ko: 모든 학생은 검정 또는 갈색 신발을 신어야 해요.

sentense.en: The photographer will begin taking pictures sharply at 10:00.
sentense.en_: The photographer will begin taking pictures sharply at 10:00.

sentense.en: Don't be late or your picture may be left out.
sentense.en_: Don't be late or your picture may be left out.
sentense.ko: 늦지 마세요 만약, 늦은 사람은 사진을 못 찍을 수도 있습니다.
